html: There are some innings which give you a very different high. Pujara ‘s innings was one of those innings, will be long remembered. Added 78 with Ishant and Bumrah. India will need to bowl really well nowpic.twitter.com/WwCJ6EO7Jp

html: Assam, Arunachal Pradesh and Nagaland are struggling with floods. The National Disaster Response Force (NDRF) teams have rushed to Nagaland assist the local government with relief work. It’s time we stand up and support every state in need. #NorthEastFloods
text: Assam, Arunachal Pradesh and Nagaland are struggling with floods. The National Disaster Response Force (NDRF) teams have rushed to  Nagaland assist the local government with relief work. It’s time we stand up and support every state in need. #NorthEastFloods

html: Have become an even bigger admirer of Swapna Barmam after coming to know of the struggles she had to go through. 6 toes in each leg, bandaged jaw, father a rickshaw puller and countless struggles. This is her mother watching her win the Gold on television, thanking the almightypic.twitter.com/GNBVPw1kDO

1. Manjot won 50m,200m free style gold, 100m backstroke gold, 200m breast stroke gold ,100m butter fly gold 
2. Puneet grabbed 200,400 mfree style gold, 100m bronze 
3. Mrityunjay grabbef 800m free style goldpic.twitter.com/d7Uzz2rCve

html: Really feel for Govindan Lakshmanan who was earlier declared Bronze Medal winner in Men's 10000m,but has been disqualified because his foot once touched inside the track. All that effort for 4 yrs & such a difficult pill to swallow. Hope he is treated a winner when he comes back
text: Really feel for Govindan Lakshmanan who was earlier declared Bronze Medal winner in Men's 10000m,but has been disqualified because his foot once touched inside the track. All that effort for 4 yrs & such a difficult pill to swallow. Hope he is treated a winner when he comes back
